channel.title: All jobs | upwork.com
channel.description: All jobs as of June 08, 2022 09:00 UTC

item.title: Middle iOS Developer, Automotive Sphere (6+ months project) - Poland location only - Upwork
item.description:
- After 6 months there is an opportunity to get a direct job
- Start date: ASAP
- Duration: 6+ months
- English: Upper-Intermediate
- The candidates have to be based only in Poland

**We are looking for a Middle iOS Developer to join our team on a full-time basis to develop a mobile application for customers in the automotive sphere**

You will join a highly motivated team and will be working on a modern solution for our existing client. We are looking for technology experts who want to make an impact on new businesses by applying best practices and taking ownership.

**Responsibilities**

- Develop native mobile applications for iOS;
- Create and maintain architecture design and documentation;
- New feature development;
- Integrate mobile apps with web services;
- Tests development;
- Conduct code reviews;
- Mentorship of junior and middle colleagues.

**Requirements**

- 4+ years of iOS apps development experience;
- Strong knowledge of Swift programming language;
- Communication with stakeholders and other product team members;
- Strong CoreData knowledge;
- Experience with CoreAnimation framework;
- Experience in unit and integration testing (XCTest);
- Experience with common Design Principles;
- Experience with iOS APIs and Capabilities;
- Experience with common 3rd party libraries;
- Understanding of app signing, provisioning, etc;
- Experience with automated builds and CI;
- Good knowledge of SOLID, KISS, DRY Principles;
- Experience with VCS (git);
- Upper-Intermediate spoke and written English communication skills.

**Desirable**

- Familiarity with Agile;
- Experience with CLI;
- Experience with TDD/BDD;
- Familiarity with SwiftUI, Combine.

**Personal skills**

- Works under general direction accepts guidance, and has work reviewed at agreed milestones;
- Has working-level contact with customers and colleagues;
- May supervise others or make decisions that impact the work assigned to individuals or phases of projects;
- Performs a range of work, sometimes complex and non-routine;
- Demonstrates effective communication skills;
- Plans, schedules, and monitors own work (and that of others where applicable) competently;
- Contributes fully to the work of teams.

Hourly Range: $24.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 08, 2022 08:55 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:iOS, Swift, XCTest
Country: Ukraine
click to apply

item.title: Need a eBay listing template - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there

Need a responsive eBay listing template. it require,

100% Fully Mobile & Tablet Friendly
100% eBay Compatible,
HTTPS compliant Listing Template,
No Active Content / Dynamic Content
JavaScript Not allowed
Fast Loading
SEO Friendly

I've added the sample but you can follow own modern attractive style. Kindly put your proposal if you can meet my all requirements. If any question please ask. I will happy to talk about it.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 08, 2022 08:53 UTC
Category: Ecommerce Website Development
Skills:eBay Listing, HTML, CSS, HTML5, SEO, Web Design, eBay Marketing, eBay Web Services, Adobe Photoshop
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: iOS development - Upwork
item.description:
I have an abandoned app built in Objective-C that barely works nowadays. I need an iOS developer that can rewrite it with Swift. Consider this a trial task. If you'll handle it successfuly, there is a strong possibility of a long-term relationship including building addtional features and a back-end database for the app. Right now the app only has front-end and is used exclusively by my employees.

Hourly Range: $40.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 08, 2022 08:53 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:iOS, Swift, iOS Development, Objective-C, Mobile App Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Complete a couple of features in the iOS app - Upwork
item.description:
We have an iOS app that is completed for 70% and we will need to polish some bugs and complete already begun tasks and features in the app.

Scope:
- Add a couple of screens to the app plus connect them to the API;
- Create and check localStorage by using CoreData;
- Add some animations by using ready frameworks to the app;
- Integrate In-App Analytics;

Tech Stack:
- Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI;
- Alamofire, SDWebImage, SwiftyJSON;
- CoreData;
- Appsflyer, FirebaseAnalytics, Amplitude;
- IAP with Apphud;
- Facebook SDK;
- Hero & Wave for animations;

Budget: $700
Posted On: June 08, 2022 08:51 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:In-App Advertising, Advanced Analytics, API Integration, Push Notifications, Camera, iOS, Swift, iOS Development, Mobile App Development, In-App Purchases
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Flutter developer needed to create a mobile application used to locate healthcare providers - Upwork
item.description:
1. Flutter developer to build a mobile application used to locate healthcare providers.
2. UI interface for an application that provides users with nearest healthcare providers to them, schedule appointments with nearest healthcare providers and locate and order drugs from drug stores.
3. The developer must be very familiar with flutter

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 08, 2022 08:47 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Android, iOS, Flutter, Mobile App Development
Country: Nigeria

item.title: Fix error in React Native app re change in the order of Hooks - Upwork
item.description:
I build a sortable list with react-native-reanimated, which is working when I have a list of items, however when I add a new item to that list (that I want to be sortable as well), I get the following error:

Warning: React has detected a change in the order of Hooks called by SortableList. This will lead to bugs and errors if not fixed. For more information, read the Rules of Hooks: https://reactjs.org/link/rules-of-hooks (see attached screenshot).

The items are connected to a react-hook-form and have input fields with ref.


Budget: $30
Posted On: June 08, 2022 08:42 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:React Native, Mobile App Development
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: iOS App Store Optimization and Submission expert required - Upwork
item.description:
We have a iOS app that is stuck in the app review process, due to the nature of the app.
Two major sticking points are that the app makes use of an API that we leverage from a 3rd party, and that the app is used to purchase Bitcoin. The automatic review process is rejecting the app based on these criteria and we have been stuck in this position for near 2 months.

We require an expert in iOS app submissions and the review process to guide and manage the submission process to ensure that our app gets listed on the App Store. We currently have a Android app that is live in the market.

The app is very simple, it acquires funds from the users linked bank account (across an EFT rail) and transfers this into a digital wallet (held with an accountable, regulated institution). These funds are used to purchase Bitcoin for the user on a weekly basis. The Bitcoin is purchased from a local South African exchange, where it is held in custody for the user. The 3rd party API belongs to the regulated institution who has the integration to the Bitcoin exchange as well as the digital wallet where the fiat funds are held.

Our app is the front end that acquires the funds from the user and manages the digital wallets (fiat and BTC) for the user.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 08, 2022 08:37 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Smartphone, Hybrid App Development, API Integration, Payment Functionality, App Store Optimization, Mobile App, Compliance, iOS, iOS Development, Mobile App Development
Country: South Africa
click to apply
item.content:encoded:
We have a iOS app that is stuck in the app review process, due to the nature of the app.
Two major sticking points are that the app makes use of an API that we leverage from a 3rd party, and that the app is used to purchase Bitcoin. The automatic review process is rejecting the app based on these criteria and we have been stuck in this position for near 2 months.

We require an expert in iOS app submissions and the review process to guide and manage the submission process to ensure that our app gets listed on the App Store. We currently have a Android app that is live in the market.

The app is very simple, it acquires funds from the users linked bank account (across an EFT rail) and transfers this into a digital wallet (held with an accountable, regulated institution). These funds are used to purchase Bitcoin for the user on a weekly basis. The Bitcoin is purchased from a local South African exchange, where it is held in custody for the user. The 3rd party API belongs to the regulated institution who has the integration to the Bitcoin exchange as well as the digital wallet where the fiat funds are held.

Our app is the front end that acquires the funds from the user and manages the digital wallets (fiat and BTC) for the user.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 08, 2022 08:37 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Smartphone, Hybrid App Development, API Integration, Payment Functionality, App Store Optimization, Mobile App, Compliance, iOS, iOS Development, Mobile App Development
Country: South Africa
click to apply
